name: Register on SADE
description:
As a developer who already registered
I want to edit my informations
So that I can properly be chosen to a project

name: Register at SADE as a developer
description:
As a CONPEC admin
I want to create a new admin
So a new user can manage SADE

name: Delete a user at SADE
description:
As a CONPEC admin
I want to delete an existing user
So he cant sign in anymore

name: Register at SADE as a developer
description:
As a developer
I want to register at Sade
So that I can get a job

name: Developer filter service
description:
As an Conpec member  
I want to filter developers by their attributes
So that i can choose based on the best fit for the project

name: Edit a developer profile
description:
As a developer registered at SADE
I want to edit my profile
So that I can update my info

name: Retrieve a lost password
description:
As a user that is already registered at SADE
I want to retrieve the password to my account
So that i can access SADE again

name: Insert technology subjects into SADE
description:
As a CONPEC admin
I want to create a new technology subject
So a developer can rate his knowledge in it

name: Create a new CONPEC admin
description:
As a CONPEC admin
I want to create a new admin user
So that he can have admin privileges

name: Only accept safe usernames at the signup
description:
As a malicious user
I want to create a malicious username
So that he can have admin privileges without permission

name: Manage active sessions
description:
As a registered user
I want to manage existing sessions
So that i can choose which ones can still stay logged in

name: Deny acess to unauthorized users
description:
As an user
I want to acess an out of bounds page
So that he can have access to sensible informations

name: Register on SADE
description:
As a conpec member
I want to open the filter-dev page
So that I can properly choose a dev to a project

name: Show Developer Data Screen
description:
As a CONPEC Admin
I want to see the developers's data
So that I can choose the best one for a project

name: Select new technology on the developer register form
description:
As a developer
I want to select new technology subjects on my profile
So I can rate my knowledge in them

name: Register on SADE
description:
As an conpec member
I want to open the filter-dev page
So that I can properly choose a dev to a project
